title: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details - duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page.

i. The first and second columns could be merged.

j.
OB:
The marking between the button and list is too large.

Top button should be aligned with the dialog top.

The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic.

Multiple selection should be allowed, as move up / down can be applied on more than one item.

Signature preview must be a label that wraps.

It would be nice if the signature preview had the background color set to the same color as a hover.
EB:
The marking between the button and list should be reduced to an appropriate size.

The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog.

The table should have a label for better usability.

Multiple selection should be allowed in the list.

The signature preview should be a label that wraps the text.

The signature preview should have the background color set to the same color as a hover.
